title: 1st CodeX Intra-College Programming Competition
description: June 28, 2024 - Mapúa MCL ACM Student Chapter hosted its first ever CodeX Programming Competition available to college students of Mapúa MCL for the CCIS Month. As part of the long awaited CCIS Month, Mapúa MCL ACM Student Chapter has prepared yet another exciting showdown of skills and logic in Python Programming. For the first time ever, the annual CodeX Competition is open to students in the Mapúa MCL CCIS Department on June 28th. The event is a 4-hour Coding Competition that tests the competitors' basic understanding of Python programming with coding problems that are solved through critical thinking.
summary: On June 28, 2024, Mapúa MCL ACM Student Chapter hosted its first ever CodeX Programming Competition available to college students of Mapúa MCL for the CCIS Month.
